name: Chat
description: Configure, send and intercept chat messages.

static_functions.name: AddMessage
static_functions.description: Adds a chat message which will display local only

static_functions.name: SendMessage
static_functions.description: Sends a chat message to a Player only

parameters.name: player
parameters.description: The player to receive the message

static_functions.name: SetConfiguration
static_functions.description: Configures the Chat visuals and position

static_functions.name: SetVisibility
static_functions.description: Sets if the Chat is visible or not

static_functions.name: BroadcastMessage
static_functions.description: Sends a chat message to all Players

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to send to all Players

events.name: PlayerSubmit
events.description: Called when a player submits a message in the chat

return.description: Return false to prevent the message from being sent

arguments.name: message
arguments.description: The message sent by the player

arguments.name: player
arguments.description: The player who sent the message - on client it will always be the localplayer

events.name: ChatEntry
events.description: Called when a new Chat Message is received, this is also triggered when new messages are sent programatically
events.description_long:
Called when a new Chat Message is received, this is also triggered when new messages are sent programatically

This is useful for creating your own Chat interface while still use the built-in system

arguments.name: player
arguments.description: The player who sent the message or nil if this was called on client side or was sent through code
